response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your highest standards. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, reflecting over $10,000 in investment, creativity, and expertise. Considering its unique qualities and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire it for $12,000. This price reflects not only its intrinsic worth but also the opportunity for you to own a piece of something truly special. I believe this is a fair and generous offer, allowing us both to benefit from this transaction. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 12000}
